titleStmt.title: Give ear you gathered churches, socalled, in England and Ireland and hear what truth saith of you concerning your dealing towards God, for the day hath discovered you, and God is coming enquire for his own amongst you.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to James Naylor. cf. NUC pre-1956.
